sub_title: Program Officer Applied and Engineering Sciences (AES) at NWO (Dutch Research Council)
summary: I have research experience in fossil fuels and carbon capture and storage at Stanford University, Imperial College London and Shell, working in multidisciplinary teams cross-linking industry and academia. In my experimental work I characterize heterogeneous pore structures and the fluid interactions that are critical for hydrocarbon recovery and CO2 storage, using X-ray scattering and imaging methods.
